meanings.definition: A person or thing that moves in a circle.
meanings.sent1: The children were happy circlers on the playground roundabout.
meanings.sent2: The circlers in the sky were actually migrating birds.
meanings.sent3: The circlers in the dance class spun around like dizzy tops.
meanings.sent4: The circlers of the earth around the sun create the changing seasons.
meanings.sent5: The circlers of the merry-go-round brought joy to the children.

meanings.sent1: The circlers gathered in the park for their morning walk.
meanings.sent2: I saw a group of circlers at the race track.
meanings.sent3: The circlers in the garden looked like a colorful parade.
meanings.sent4: The circlers of the planets around the sun fascinated the astronomers.
meanings.sent5: The circlers of the wheels on the bus went round and round.
